description: Overall model specification. Choice of physics and component that will be included in the model

include_current_collectors.description: include current collector. Default it false

use_thermal.description: include thermal effects. Default is false

use_normed_current_collector.description: To avoid floating point error at the current collector, we use a reference voltage and the primary variable is a voltage difference with respect to this reference voltage. Default value is true
